document_data.name: Stonesulder wine
document_data.type: [[Wine]]{{Cite dragon/421/Abyssal Trade Goods: Not a Bad Thing|32}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Stonesulder wine''' was a white [[wine]] produced by crushing berries and vines found in the [[Abyss]]. It took its name from the merchant [[Arlast Stonesulder]] who popularized its use.
document_data.Description:
This wine was yellow in color and had a sharp flavor. Stonesulder wine was often used in cooking because it could bind sauces and gravies to food.

It had to be fermented in hardwood barrels and, unlike other wines, in a damp and warm environment.
